author: chris-dollin
msg: code. Did some cleaning. Literal values and documentation

author: chris-dollin
msg: Incomplete [disabled] changes [fails one test when enabled]
so that the default PatternStage evaluates constraints "as
soon as possible", ie, at the points when the variables
in a constraint are fully bound.

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Added capability of describing boolean classes, and made a copy of
food.owl and wine.owl due to improper imports problem

author: chris-dollin
msg: Node_Variable's now have a label that is not a string
("?" + name) but an instance of a new class with the name
as its field. This means (a) there is less risk of variable names
and bad URIs being confused, (b) there is less string
arithmetic going on, making it more likely that equals()
strings are ==, which improves hashmap lookup, which
may be important in query evaluation.
